scripts.mobile:web: mkdir -p mobile_www && cp -f index.html mobile_www/index.html && rm -rf mobile_www/assets && cp -R assets mobile_www/assets
scripts.mobile:sync: npm run mobile:web && npx cap sync
scripts.mobile:ios: npm run mobile:sync && npx cap open ios
scripts.mobile:android: npm run mobile:sync && npx cap open android
